name: The Stranded Traveler
description:
Welcome to The Stranded Traveler!

Embark on an epic journey in The Stranded Traveler, a 2D side-scrolling action-adventure game where you take on the role of a traveler stranded on a mysterious island. Explore dangerous environments, fight fierce enemies, and defeat challenging enemies as you make your way through the game's levels. With a retro-inspired art style and fast-paced hack-and-slash gameplay, The Stranded Traveler offers a challenging experience that's sure to appeal to fans of classic platformers.

As you progress through the game, you'll uncover the truth behind the organization responsible for dooming Earth. With the fate of the world in your hands, you'll need to take down this powerful organization and restore the world to its former glory. Do you have what it takes to survive the challenges ahead and save humanity from certain doom? Only time will tell in The Stranded Traveler.

What to do in The Stranded Traveler?

Fight monsters, loot & sell items, Upgrade your character

Figure out who created all these mysterious creatures on earth!
Single-Player with Mini-Games within (Mini-Games described below) & Much more!

Mini-Games

1. Ball Mini-Game, make sure you hit the balls in the right direction!

2. Legacy Space Shooter Mini-Game! Shoot the asteroids to make it out.
3. The Stranded Cafe: Gamble your hard earned coins for a change to win extra coin's & upgrade's




Developed by DeadEagle, Published by Spitfire-Games™
